Summary: i was in a park in chicago with two friends i was sitting and saw a metalic cigar shaped object flying from e/w next thing i noticed it was the size of a street light yellow in color and hovered ov
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting in a park with two friends i observed a cigar shaped object metalic in color going from e\w pretty hi up... the next thing i knew it was directly over head the size of a street light tellow in color and not a sound.it hovered over us for about 4 seconds by the time i turned my head westit was the size of a star it paused and made a 90 degree turn north where it dipped and shot up and dipped and shot up again and it was gone...i had one other incident in the fall of 92 in missouri i was in a rural visitors house in a secluded area i woke to the dogs barking raised to my left sholder facing 3 luvered windows which were open and heard the tune from close encounters of the third kind and said to myself oh no...( i was a chicago policeman then) all i remember is falling asleep immediatelly..the next day i noticed a nark on my left calf..i picked at it and some little copper or brass came out.i still hsve the scar that itches occasionally..ty..i just wanted to document these events..ps i did call the air force on the first event and they said kid it was a weather baloon!!!the report was in the local paper southtown economist..thanks again,,, jack
